name: Aery: Cyber City
storyline:
You start in the middle of a fast-moving futuristic city.

You are a little bird that moves continuously forward and is free to fly wherever you want.

You fly around in between the giant skyscrapers and dodge some flying cars and trains while exploring your surroundings.

After you have played around a little and enjoyed the sensation of flying you start to discover the nearby areas and hidden secrets. You fly towards a giant colorful balcony with many decorations.

Once you come closer you see a bright shining memory shard right in front of you.
The memory shards are hidden all over the different worlds and contain memories and information about the different levels, the background story, and your memories of a long-lost friend. You fly towards the shard and collect it.
Once you have found a certain amount of memory shards you will be able to remember the right path and can enter the next area - the story continues. On your journey, you will follow the story of your little bird who was living in this futuristic city with an old human but then decided to look for a more beautiful home after losing his best friend. Intrigued, you move forward.
summary: In Aery Cyber City you play a little bird on its journey to find a home after losing its dear friend. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.
